mapper.select: SELECT r.room_id, r.room_name, r.room_desc, r.room_addr, r.phone, r.room_img, r.priority, r.create_time, r.last_edit_time, r.enable_status, r.advice, a.area_id, a.area_name, rc.room_category_id, rc.room_category_name FROM tb_room r, tb_area a, tb_room_category rc WHERE r.area_id = a.area_id AND r.room_category_id = rc.room_category_id AND r.room_id = #{roomId}
